Reviews.Title: “good hotel”
Reviews.Author: pearlan
Reviews.Content: returned 3 night stay hotel found location dam helpful stayed rm overlooks lane front single glazed sounds lane traffic passes believe rooms rear hotel rm serviced everyday good size plenty rm comfortably move around hanging en suite shower comfy bed lift types coffee fruit enjoyable definately stay wouldnt hesitate recommend family consider high standards

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: brucetupholme
Reviews.Content: 1st trip amsterdam hit lucky booked hotel perfect central location dam square room overlooking alley way happy room breakfast would definately stay

Reviews.Title: “Good Value Hotel”
Reviews.Author: wvtravelman
Reviews.Content: location excellent rest staff specially friendly hardly looked us room small ok room extra beds 3 persons could stay one room also accident cup floor came back room wasnt cleaned reception called room said would clean payed 10 euros extra powder wasnt supposed floor anyway take extra charge extra work cleaner powder would taken staff maybe 56 seconds extra minibar 3 days either would recommend hotel persons expensive average standard friendly hardly look say hello

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel with a decent price”
Reviews.Author: rlro
Reviews.Content: nice hotel central location amsterdam around corner dam square behind hotel perfect location explore city access location around city center rooms ok service lively surroundings quite place stay

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel next to a busy square”
Reviews.Author: badeendje
Reviews.Content: well located hotel doesnt suffer much noise bustle around bit overpriced offers wouldnt first choice amsterdam booking short notice convenient options room third floor directly roof air con essential amsterdam perfectly effective room basic ready upgrade clean bathroom staff friendly essentially theres nothing particularly wrong place nothing particular stands either

Reviews.Title: “Good quality with helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Rogertb
Reviews.Content: hotel need refurbishment allocated room beds bathroom ok towels virtually worst hospitality tray ever seen room serviced 3 day stay offer staff assist small luggage paid would expected lot attention detail location good thats

Reviews.Title: “great location good value”
Reviews.Author: cactus52
Reviews.Content: wife recently spent four nights tulip inn location excellent easy access public transit interesting walks spite nearby dam square room quiet comfortable breakfast quite adequate however housekeeping left something desired shelves closet quite dusty bathroom one day least cleaned found various staff reception desk helpful

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: CinziaItalia
Reviews.Content: hotel located center good sightseeing however pedestrian areas cars trains noise say walls thin neighbours possibly may hear chatting one night problem receptionist solved everything polite manner breakfast included im sure special offer usual terms good choice food quality service one drawback noticed room cleanliness little bit dusty mean dust table shelves lamp bed linen towels clean front entrance found small cafe fantastic pastry finally satisfied tulip inn next time wed go back

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Good Value”
Reviews.Author: marvellousmarvin
Reviews.Content: back weekend tulip inn amsterdam weekend hotel around corner dam square 10 minute walk red light district excellent location coffee shop straight across street handy indeed room stayed clean basic heat unbearable room window stay open night minor great 3 nights noise street rooms big bonus breakfast let basic would 100 stay tulip inn location everything else

Reviews.Title: “standart best western quality”
Reviews.Author: ozzyUA
Reviews.Content: location central one needs city situated street couple bars coffee shops several nice restaurants hotel well run typical 3 affair everything room reasonable size spotless plasma tv lots channels got deal three nights made things well worth breakfast good self service finished 1030 bit mind city break tourists staff efficient friendly bad review two wonder spent much time coffee shop rubbish dont put recommend

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for money”
Reviews.Author: Helmy7
Reviews.Content: hotel good one stay 3 times stayed else better value everything doorstep far bed bugs go load

Reviews.Title: “Bargain price, no complaints whatsoever !”
Reviews.Author: parmo1
Reviews.Content: 5 visits city last found hotel would happily stay reasonably priced amsterdam standards offers central location dam square high quality accommodation room spacious bathroom spotless new equipment teacoffee making stuff available beds comfortable high quality wireless internet costs 7 euros day breakfast good selection satisfactory hot food available eg scrambled eggs reception staff helpful polite bad surprise housekeeping found windows room left wide open thank god raining 10mins otherwise carpet would soaked unacceptable safety reasons well beds really made bed cover bed maid even pillows stayed 2 nights dont know whether isolated incident standard housekeeping however kind good impression hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great value hotel”
Reviews.Author: MEK2511
Reviews.Content: hotel situated perfectly central area amsterdam major tourist site situated right nice highend area city coffee shop district hotel outside looks nice surrounded nice outdoor cafes great summer sure winter months inside would expect chain hotel class think comfort inn smaller little aged rooms small hotel acceptable much better breakfast expected im real stayed great places know expect hotel case wanted base save money manage expectations want decent place base go want hotel experience cool boutique hotel look somewhere else good options little closer park really dont need middle always near park museums europe manage quality expectations

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay -- Fantastic Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: tommypain
Reviews.Content: friendly helpful desk staff welcomed us arrival gave us good first impression hotel amsterdam general room quite big comfortable bed view lively little street outside hotel recently completely everything looked clean fresh continental breakfast offered plenty options wait staff attentive area dam square lots good restaurants cafes bars etc nearby many tourist attractions within easy walking distance tram service excellent tram stops close hotel hotel staff provided safe storage luggage day leaving came back collect ordered taxi us provided cold drinks free one room front hotel late night street noise people light sleepers would well advised ask rooms back complaint lights good anyone likes read bed big new tv plenty english speaking channels compensation

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel easy to get to from Tegel Airport”
Reviews.Author: lapetede
Reviews.Content: come back 2 nights tulip hotel dam square lovely hotel clean good position nice side went early check made us wait dont let anyone check 2 pm room ready ready dont see cant let check whatever time breakfast continental good plenty choices need go hungry bought package trips good value euros hop hop boat excellant way getting around flight back till 730 last day country side tour 930 til certainly worth seeing picturesque leave bags hotel dont want carry around leave office tour company good tip visiting anne frank house buy ticket tourist information office near central station 50 cents choose time want go walk straight get instead good trip

Reviews.Title: “Given the price it is perfect”
Reviews.Author: Marcel_Amsterdam
Reviews.Content: rooms aint big yes hotel need quite badly beds comfy hotel quiet bathrooms brand new nice place rest cafes bars destination hotel would also fantastic staff well used helping confused tourists

Reviews.Title: “Great value!”
Reviews.Author: dylanw_uk
Reviews.Content: person put bit decor accept last review said however see past bit decor looking hotel excellent location amazing staff lovely breakfast hotel reception breakfast area immaculate well decorated yes true rooms could new wall paper guess matters plan staying room watching tv rather seeing fantastic city room exceptionally clean bathroom immaculate looked new staff extremely helpful friendly spoke amazing english hotel located 30 seconds walk dam square 8 minutes train station 30 seconds main shops including supermarket 2 minutes away terms price thought competitive per night middle may could get great located hotel price elsewhere amsterdam tried

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service/excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jennlonice
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night took us ages pick good location hotel finally pick one stayed company last year saint france could fault hence going amsterdam got early room ready til 2 let us bags store room left us free sight see informed us double bedroom big enough put extra bed old put us triple price double room smell smoke holland smoking policy expect opened window went air beds good comfy room clean location excellent us walking eating could picked better location breakfast plentiful eat much want room 11 getting collected 5 let us put bags store room til needed would recommend stay

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't hesitate to recommend it”
Reviews.Author: CheshireCouple
Reviews.Content: two girlfriends stayed tulip inn dam square 3 nights november thanks positive reviews tripadvisor booked lovely hotel central everything amsterdam required arriving schipol airport came arrivals walked straight railway station follow signs take train amsterdam central really easy trains run every 20 mins get tickets yellow ticket machine 3 euros 60 cents one way train journey takes 15 mins exit railway station aware trams course everywhere walked station hotel took 10 15 mins cases head dam square hotel easy find arrival checked really quickly nice staff shown lift take us floor room requested quiet room high floor 3 single beds got room clean good size heating extra long beds rather sheets coffee making facilities tv nice size bathroom walk corner shower soft towels also hairdryer cleanest bathroom seen hotel stayed room rate included breakfast lovely breakfast room never busy always plenty food offer choice tea coffee brought table served cereals fruit juices cold meats cheeses toast fresh fruit great start day without feeling rush also bar foyer hotel used many bars choose outside hotel especially st bar restaurant 2 doors away hotel relaxed atmosphere nice food bar restaurant must recommend one found close red light district called street called excellent find attentive staff wonderful menu ate two evenings three amsterdam cheese king die nights spent four hours eating meal nothing rushed felt totally relaxed glass port end meal cake great city break nice hotel central location need without spend fortune couldnt fault hotel would recommend

Reviews.Title: “Good value and convenient location”
Reviews.Author: PeterB
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel 3 nights fantastic hotel great value money hotel right centre town situated beside dam square dam room stayed massive tea coffee facilities room hotel spotless staff friendly helpful breakfast selection breads cheese fruit cereals would advise everyone looking perfect hotel right centre amsterdam book one

Reviews.Title: “Clean and convenient hotel”
Reviews.Author: AlexFamily
Reviews.Content: wife stayed tulip hotel 6 nights amsterdam hotels often charge worth chose hotel mostly based tripadvisor reviews wanted stay near location perfect hotel didnt arrived entered nice lobby bar nice reception everything ok also arrived 1pm room already ready room nice bed small tv remote tv wasnt really important phone answering machine window front street didnt hear noise night morning quiet street nice bathroom window front street nice shower water pressure bit weak offered coffee tea could make room elevator corridors also breakfast types bread boiled eggs coffee tea cheese etc could lot better dont expect big breakfast staff nice noticed rooms didnt window facing front street window facing inside terrace instead wich wasnt ok stayed one rooms would probably complaining instead saying long get room similar one got happy expensive amsterdam standards pay safe location great difference price similar hotels good locations would stay

Reviews.Title: “Interesting location, hot room”
Reviews.Author: JJudy
Reviews.Content: two night break late may 07 amsterdam stayed tulip inn dam square like wife looks clean well run hotel situated heart city hotel 3 hotel far expectations rooms fairly large bathroom plenty wardrobe space air condition tv ask room back hotel require total peace quiet breakfast included price continental style variety exceptional staff attentive reception staff helpful assisted us getting around city places go downside hotel one leads hotel fair bit graffiti walls put thought might worth mention hotel could better situated within walking distance main sites shops unless tourist everything disappointed hotel

Reviews.Title: “Another good review!”
Reviews.Author: LCFC
Reviews.Content: spent two nights hotel modern chain hotel design behind old facade without character amsterdam hotels however staff friendly helpful breakfast good bed comfortable hotel quiet although two minutes dam square would point two tulip hotels amsterdam possibly make sure know one youve chosen

Reviews.Title: “Just OK Adequate”
Reviews.Content: good hotel short break right dam square hotel quiet couldnt hear noise night breakfast good plenty tends smoke smell around seems norm amsterdam rooms clean staff extremely helpful dont drink bar though prices high plenty nearby would definitely use

Reviews.Title: “The Bear Necessities of life!”
Reviews.Author: AYariv
Reviews.Content: went city nights boyfriend couldnt find hotel central quite reasonable price travel agent took great care choosing right hotel require luxury hotel hotels location hard beat rooms fine clean tidy going city break tend around hotel breakfast continental opted get breakfast elsewhere like little fresh bread coffee etc lovely great hotel exploring city nice quite quaint little street hard beat

Reviews.Title: “Euro Hotel is comfortable & convenient”
Reviews.Author: zenobie
Reviews.Content: stayed tulip inn dam square one night november perfect location right smack middle amsterdam staff friendly rooms clean pleasant break ideal place stay overall happy

Reviews.Title: “Cracking location and good safe area”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: location hotel fairly dated rooms feel like bathrooms done recently staff helpful recommending anywhere eat great little bar 4 doors pair shoes left friends putting say least stayed one night although location great wouldnt stay

Reviews.Title: “Just back from the Euro”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: great find friendly helpful courteous staff hotel excellent position sights shops buffet breakfast ideal set day flight cancelled arrived early next morning gave us room quickly although two friends wait 40 mins nonsmoking room didnt charge us night would recommend hotel highly city break

Reviews.Title: “Great value and convenience”
Reviews.Author: lippi
Reviews.Content: second visit amsterdam us highly recommend hotel location service room small clean quiet center town tourist spots literally bus ride away staff speak english room quaint ask third floor sky light open closed like small atmosphere loved little bar b fast area one return find value many positives negatives

Reviews.Title: “Ideal location if flying in through Schonefeld airport”
Reviews.Author: PLomond
Reviews.Content: clean good choice breakfast ever visit amsterdam hopefully wouldnt hesitate using hotel convenient location well great little hotel
